content: 1 - fuck dishcloth - - tigard needlework - fuck dishcloth the details this dishcloth came out a desire for a charted pattern something i could follow a bit easier than a blurb of text since i ve already got the charts ready i figured i d put it all together for everyone else to use too sometimes you just really need to give a fuck1 after all pattern difficulty stitches guide - knit k materials - purl p gauge 18 st & 28 row = 4 yarn worsted weight cotton yarn sample used about 50 10 cm in st st worked yards of lily sugar n cream in seabreeze flat gauge is not a huge deal but you ll needle s us 5 3 75 mm needles flat circular or double want a tight fabric to pointed will work dishcloth is worked flat show off the words notions yarn needle for weaving in ends finished size 7 5 x 7 5 will vary with yarn & needles used note the sample slips the first stitch of each row with yarn in front for a smoother edge slip your first stitch if you prefer a bumpier garter edge don t worry about them all odd row are right side and all even row are wrong side 2014 2020 © tigard needlework www tigardneedlework etsy com www ravelry com/people/sketchymurr 2 - fuck dishcloth - - tigard needlework - pattern cast on 35 stitches with your choice of cast on sample used a cable cast on however a basic knitted cast on is also suitable row 1 5 knit all stitches to end of row row 6 and all even row through row 44 k3 p29 k3 if you prefer using a chart it is on page 4 work row 7 44 from the chart then resume at row 45 of the written pattern even row are not charted work them as row 6 for a digital version of the chart you can find it on my project page here https //www ravelry com/projects/sketchymurr/fuck-dishcloth row 7 k35 row 9 k35 row 11 k35 row 13 k35 row 15 k35 row 17 k4 p2 k2 p2 k2 p4 k3 p4 k6 p2 k4 row 19 k4 p2 k2 p2 k1 p6 k1 p6 k5 p2 k4 row 21 k4 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k5 p2 k4 row 23 k5 p2 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k5 p2 k4 row 25 k6 p4 k5 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k2 p5 k4 row 27 k6 p4 k5 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k2 p5 k4 row 29 k4 p3 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k5 p2 k4 row 31 k4 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 p2 k5 p2 k4 row 33 k4 p2 k2 p2 k1 p6 k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p6 k4 row 35 k4 p2 k2 p2 k2 p4
